companyProfile.companyDescription: NTPC Limited is an India-based power generating company. The Company is primarily involved in the generation and sale of bulk power to State Power Utilities. Its segments include Generation of energy and Others. Its generation of energy segment is engaged in generation and sale of bulk power to state power utilities. Its other segment is focused on providing consultancy, project management and supervision, energy trading, oil & gas exploration, and coal mining. The Company operates a total of 92 power stations across various Indian states, either independently or through its joint ventures (JVs) and subsidiaries. Its subsidiaries include NTPC Vidyut Vyapar Nigam Limited, NTPC Electric Supply Company Limited, Bhartiya Rail Bijlee Company Limited, Patratu Vidyut Utpadan Nigam Limited, NTPC Mining Limited, North Eastern Electric Power Corporation Limited, THDC India Limited, NTPC EDMC Waste Solutions Private Limited, NTPC Green Energy Limited, and Ratnagiri Gas and Power Private Limited.

recentNews.headline: NTPC Green Energy share price gains over 3% on signing of 1000 MW power purchase deal
recentNews.intro: NTPC Green Energy shares rose 3.8% to  ?112 after announcing a Power Purchase Agreement for 1,000 MW capacity. The company reported a net profit increase of 255% in Q1 and a 39% rise in FY25 profit, reflecting strong performance in the renewable energy sector.
recentNews.imagecaption: NTPC Green Energy share price gains over 3% on signing of 1000 MW power purchase deal

recentNews.imagecaption: Stocks to watch: Vedanta, BEL, Yes Bank, REC, Power Grid among shares in focus today.

recentNews.headline: RRB NTPC Admit Card 2025: Railway Recruitment Board to release CBT 1 hall ticket today; how to download
recentNews.intro: RRB NTPC Admit Card 2025: Railway Recruitment Board will release the RRB NTPC CBT 1 admit card today. The exam for various non-technical posts will take place from June 4 to June 24 for a total of 8,113 vacancies.
recentNews.imagecaption: RRB NTPC Admit Card 2025: The RRB NTPC CBT 1 exam will take place from June 4 to June 24.

recentNews.headline: NTPC's project execution delays remain its Achilles heel
recentNews.intro: The company plans substantial capacity addition, but execution risks remain high, affecting overall market confidence.
recentNews.imagecaption: NTPC missed its capacity addition target of 6 GW in FY25 due to land transfer and supply issues.

recentNews.headline: NTPC vs NHPC: Which power PSU stock deserves a spot in your portfolio after Q4 results?
recentNews.intro: Stocks to buy: NTPC and NHPC, state-owned power companies, reported steady Q4FY25 results. NTPC's net profit rose 22%, prompting brokerages to adjust target prices. NHPC's profit grew 52%, but ICICI Securities downgraded its rating, given the recent run-up in shares.
recentNews.imagecaption: NTPC vs NHPC after Q4 numbers: Which power PSU deserves a spot in your portfolio?

recentNews.headline: Q4 results today: PC Jeweller, Sundaram Brake Linings among companies to declare earnings on Sunday, May 25
recentNews.intro: Q4 results today: On Sunday, May 25, 2025, companies such as Jyoti CNC Automation, PC Jeweller, and Sundaram Brake Linings are scheduled to declare financial results.
recentNews.imagecaption: Q4 results today: three companies will announce earnings on Sunday, May 25, 2025.

recentNews.headline: NTPC Q4 Results: Net profit rises 4% to  ?5,778 crore, revenue 3% YoY; Dividend declared
recentNews.intro: NTPC Q4 Results: The board of directors has recommended a final dividend of 33.50 per cent ( ?3.35 per share) for 2024-25, subject to approval of shareholders in the ensuing annual general meeting.
recentNews.imagecaption: NTPC National Thermal POWER Corporation Gandhar , Bharuch, Gujarat .Gas Source :Gandhar Gas field

recentNews.headline: Q4 results today: NTPC, JK Cement among 109 companies to declare earnings on Saturday, May 24 ? Full list here
recentNews.intro: Q4 results today: Companies such as NTPC and JK Cement are set to release their Q4 results on May 24, 2025, according to the BSE calendar.
recentNews.imagecaption: Q4 results today: NTPC will announce earnings on Saturday, May 23.
